issue.title: [Dev][Release] Correct Java versions to 3.0.0-SNAPSHOT
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10478](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10478). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After the 2.0.0 release, other languages were bumped to 3.0.0-SNAPSHOT in master but Java pom files weren't. Update them to 3.0.0-SNAPSHOT.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10478?focusedCommentId=17225674) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8577
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8577>
